cards.name: Thor
cards.bio: The God of Thunder, armed with his mighty hammer Mjolnir.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Thor wielding Mjolnir, dynamic, lightning, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Loki
cards.bio: The mischievous and cunning God of Mischief.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Loki with a sly smile, holding daggers, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Hulk
cards.bio: The incredible green giant, strongest Avenger, ready to smash.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hulk in gladiator armor, roaring, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Valkyrie
cards.bio: A tough Asgardian warrior with a haunted past.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Valkyrie with sword and armor, determined, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Heimdall
cards.bio: The all-seeing and all-hearing Asgardian sentry of the Bifrost Bridge.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Heimdall with his sword Hofund, vigilant, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Korg
cards.bio: A Kronan gladiator with a rocky appearance and a gentle soul.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Korg with a friendly gesture, made of rocks, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Miek
cards.bio: An insectoid alien and a friend of Korg, skilled in combat.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Miek with blades for hands, alien insectoid, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Grandmaster
cards.bio: The eccentric and flamboyant ruler of the Contest of Champions.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Grandmaster with a confident smirk, colorful robes, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Skurge
cards.bio: The Asgardian warrior who briefly served Hela, seeking redemption.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Skurge with his axe, conflicted, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Surtur
cards.bio: A fiery giant destined to bring about Ragnarok.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Surtur in flames, colossal, Thor: Ragnarok style

cards.name: Hela
cards.bio: The Goddess of Death and Thor's older sister, determined to rule Asgard.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Hela with her antler-like headdress, menacing, Thor: Ragnarok style
